item.title: The consequences of social media
item.description: Introduction This article derives from an essay I wrote for my dream university. Beyond the academic purpose, this article is motivated by a deep interest in studying the dynamics of society and its most influential factors. You can check the references for each fact for further research, or to assess the validity of my statements, which reflect my vision on the topic. Credits to @robert_rednine from unsplash.com The popularity of social media have steadily grown for the last 15 years: 2.
